Botella joined the People's Alliance in 1978. She served for 14 years as civil servant in the Ministry of the Interior, the Civil Governance of Logroño, the Ministry of Public Works, the Ministry of Finance, and the Ministry of Finance in Valladolid.

Ana Botella Serrano (amụrụ na abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Julaị afọ 1953) bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị mba Spain onye jere ozi dị ka onye isi obodo Madrid site na 2011 ruo 2015.ọ bụkwa nwunye nke Praịm Minista mgbe di ya José María Aznar
Ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ bụ onye isi obodo Madrid.

A mụrụ Botella na Madrid na abalị iri abụọ na atọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1953. Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ ọtaakara na Colegio Irlandesas Madrid, na njikọ Congregation of Jesus. Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ gbasara iwu na Mahadum Complutense nke Madrid
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ gafere ule ọha na eze ịbụ Corps of Civil Administrators nke steeti ahụ.

Botella joined the People's Alliance in 1978. She served for 14 years as civil servant in the Ministry of the Interior, the Civil Governance of Logroño, the Ministry of Public Works, the Ministry of Finance, and the Ministry of Finance in Valladolid.
